alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 27 at 9:26AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. Agricultural damage begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 18.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CDT Thursday was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...Site is affected by backwater from the Maple River and Harwood area. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
